description: Updates an Amazon Redshift Serverless certificate associated with a custom domain.

parameters.name: customDomainCertificateArn
parameters.description: The custom domain name's certificate Amazon resource name (ARN). This is optional.

parameters.name: customDomainName
parameters.description: The custom domain name associated with the workgroup.

parameters.name: workgroupName
parameters.description: The name of the workgroup associated with the database.

nested_items.name: customDomainCertificateArn
nested_items.description: The custom domain name's certificate Amazon resource name (ARN).

nested_items.name: customDomainCertificateExpiryTime
nested_items.description: The expiration time for the certificate.

nested_items.name: customDomainName
nested_items.description: The custom domain name associated with the workgroup.

nested_items.name: workgroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the workgroup associated with the database.
